alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead National Recreation Area (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued April 05 at 12:25PM PDT until April 06 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM PDT /10 AM MST/ TO 7 PM PDT /7 PM MST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave and Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In California, San Bernardino County- Upper Colorado River Valley. In Nevada, Lake Mead National Recreation Area. * WHEN...From 10 AM PDT /10 AM MST/ to 7 PM PDT /7 PM MST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves on area lakes will create hazardous conditions for small craft.
info.instruction: Boaters on area lakes should use extra caution since strong winds and rough waves can overturn small craft.
